name: The Runner (TransGame668)
description:
You playing as a Construction Worker and running in the scene. There a 9 level in it. All level had a checkpoint so when you fall, it won't repeat. Walk in the Lake and jumping in the obstacle course, don't drowning. Find the Rainbow Cube to win the level. You can able make the player slowing by pressing "S" key, For a booster/sprint pressing "W" key.

Controls: WASD / Arrow key & Spacebar for Jump.

Music by: B_Lamerichs (freesound.org)
